thumb.title: 【Kasane Teto】Stand Tall【Synth V Original】
thumb.description: SuperSoniker - Stand Tall (feat. Kasane Teto)Stream: https://share.amuse.io/track/supersoniker-stand-tallLyrics: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1rsfbYnJbdZWWU7JW_Y_Wbw5lU_xOa-eHEyGK1Mh-rAk/Download: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/download/1437365My social media: https://linktr.ee/supersonikerA few days ago I started with the idea of writing a song that talks a little about my past, when I received endless ridicule and insults just for being too different from those around me, but thanks to a few people who were supporting me, over time I learned to value my qualities and defend myself from many insults.About the song, taking advantage of the use of FL Studio I decided to create a Hardcore song again after almost 2 years, although I feel that I still have a lot to improve, comparing this to the previous songs of that genre that I made over time, in my opinion it has been impressive for now. This time I tried to create a J-Pop style song, accompanied by a voice from Synthesizer V, taking a little inspiration from artists like Hiiragi Magnetite, Aimer, Yoasobi, and even the fast songs of F-777. And well, I hope you like this.
thumb.last_res_body: 888888888 うぽつ GJ! 全部英語の歌詞バ... いい音 うぽつ
